description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between Mighty Tiger Gaming and UU Gamers in the KPL Growth League Group Stage, scheduled for February 3 at 4:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Mighty Tiger Gaming" if Mighty Tiger Gaming wins 2 or more games than UU Gamers in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "UU Gamers".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the Honor of Kings match between Mighty Tiger Gaming and UU Gamers in the KPL Growth League Group Stage, scheduled for February 3 at 5:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Mighty Tiger Gaming" if Mighty Tiger Gaming win the match against UU Gamers.

This market will resolve to "UU Gamers" if UU Gamers win the match against Mighty Tiger Gaming.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/honorofkings/Main_Page.
events.title: Honor of Kings: Mighty Tiger Gaming vs UU Gamers (BO5) - KPL Growth League Group Stage
